messages.subject: Re: Spanking
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/19/2005 8:04:18 AM Eastern Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: This is  exactly one of the reasoning points I had
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/19/2005 8:04:18 AM Eastern Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:

This is exactly one of the reasoning points I had with the homeschooling
group and this mother in particular and they came back with all kinds of
stuff
from Dr. Dobson and that I was twisting scripture. Like I said they were
not in
the least bit willing to be reasonable.



*****************************
They WANT to be able to spank their kids, and with a clear conscience. They
don't want to question it. They want to do whatever they can to control their
kids.

Frankly, even if you interpret the Bible literally, there are lots of ways
to read this. It's not about the Bible.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
